sentence.Network_en: Supper too I eat alone. I'm filled with ennui.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚饭还是我一人独吃, 我烦恼透了.

sentence.Network_en: She shared their expatriation, their convictions, their pastimes , their ennui.
sentence.Network_cn: 她与他们有共同的流亡国外的命运, 共同的信念, 共同的乐趣, 共同的苦闷.

sentence.Network_en: Since losing his job, he has often experienced a profound sense of ennui.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自从失业以来, 常觉百无聊赖.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... bushed adj 疲倦的，迷路的 ennui n 倦怠,厌倦 | weary a 疲倦的,萎靡的,厌倦的,厌烦的.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... bushed adj 疲倦的，迷路的 ennui n 倦怠,厌倦 | weary a 疲倦的,萎靡的,厌倦的,厌烦的.
“红宝书”补充词汇（１） --外语频道--中国教育在线 ... embolden v. 使勇敢, 有勇气 ennui n. 厌倦, 无聊 eerily a. 奇怪的.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... enmity 敌意，仇恨 ennui 倦怠，无聊；v.使无聊 enormity 极恶；暴行；巨大.

list.abs: One antidote to ennui is war ., 无聊的解毒剂之一就是战争.
urban ennui , strenuous work andthe lifestyle in large cities .城市厌倦，繁重的劳动和大城市的生活方式。
...the afterglow)，我们总会看到一些老人百无聊赖的(in ennui)坐在小区的某个阴凉处( shady places)、茫然的(blindly)注视着过往的行.
despite warning shots across the bows of Australian ships of state , however , these sciences are stuck in a mire of government inaction and public ennui .尽管警告的图文遍布了澳大利亚各州，然而，政府的毫无反应和人们的厌倦让这些科学顿入困境。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: French, from Latin in odio(n-), from mihi in odio est 'it is hateful to me'. Compare with annoy

entry.def: Ennui is a feeling of being tired, bored, and dissatisfied.

means.word_mean: 1. the feeling of being bored by something tedious

auth_sentence.content: Monroe, Lennon and Kennedy were spared the inevitable ennui.
auth_sentence.res_content: Monroe, Lennon and Kennedy were spared the inevitable ennui.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Monroe, Lennon and Kennedy were spared the inevitable ennui.

auth_sentence.content: He found me too negligible to bother to disguise his ennui.
auth_sentence.res_content: He found me too negligible to bother to disguise his ennui.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He found me too negligible to bother to disguise his ennui.

auth_sentence.content: Not because of administrative ennui, although there had been plenty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not because of administrative ennui, although there had been plenty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not because of administrative ennui, although there had been plenty.
